body: This is pretty good and all (and I liked the anime too) BUT what's with her pubic hair on the cover page? It looks way thick and hairy bush, whereupon I wished it looked more like what's shown on the inside content of the doujinshi, i.e. bottom left page 3 has a more naturally (and pleasantly) looking female bush. Alright, that's it, not that it matters, so thank you for reading and enjoy the nice art!
